Hi, Julie. I'm looking forward to meeting you too.

messages.subject: Intro from a lurker
messages.msgSnippet: Since this is a New Year.. and my family and I plan on attending the Live & Learn Confrerence in Oct 05...it s so near our home town for a change!! I thought
messages.messageBody:
Since this is a New Year.. and my family and I plan on attending the Live &
Learn Confrerence in Oct 05...it's so near our home town for a change!! I
thought this might be a good time to say 'hello' again. I'm Julie in MO..
mom of 3 dd's.. ages 20, 14, and 9 yrs... the oldest is on her own, and will
be making me a 'grandma' soon... We live in the country.. I raise dairy
goats, love gardening/herbs, and riding my motorcycle. We have a couple
horse's, but I want to sell them this year to make room for more goats! My
14 yo is a poet and guitar player.. 9 yo is an amazing artist and learning
to air-brush too. We tried the school at home stuff.. but it failed of
course... total unschoolers's for the past 8 or so years....I really look
forward to meeting many of you in person this October! I hope to be more of
a poster and less of a lurker in the future! Julie in MO
